predicate.note: Frames file for 'search' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class search 35.2, no mention of other members. Comparison with 'seek'.

example.name: typical transitive
example.text: The board already has been searching for strong outside candidates, including food-industry executives with considerable international experience.
example.arg: strong outside candidates, including food-industry executives with considerable international experience
